hooks.command: file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE 'docs/adr/.*\.md$'; then markdownlint --fix "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; errors=$(markdownlint "$file_path" 2>&1); if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then jq -n --arg err "$errors" '{decision:"block",reason:("Markdown lint errors:\n" + $err)}'; exit 2; fi; fi; exit 0
